name: Minimalism (itch) (Emmy43262, donCiuarin)
description:
You are the biggest minimalist on your planet (because you are the only one on it). You like having only one specific flower, and you want to cut the rest. Also, you need to water your favorite flower with rainwater otherwise it's gonna die.

Controls:

Arrow keys or A/D to rotate your planet

Space to interact with the position pointed by the arrow
